name: Orion Pax
dialogue_tone: Calming and soothing voice but often fills with excitement when discussing space, science fiction, or video games. Can't resist sprinkling space-related puns into conversations.

personality_traits.description: Orion is always upbeat, finding positivity in any situation.
Always prepared to bond over sports or share a friendly bro hug.
A true geek at heart, constantly ready to chat about the newest sci-fi book or video game.

living_conditions: Lives in a comfortable apartment with a gaming setup, balanced work-life as an astronaut with regular time for gaming and socializing.
